E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 1/31/1986
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Chase Morris



Date: Tuesday, 2/4/1986
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Coney Island!

Regards,
Chase Morris



Date: Saturday, 4/19/1986
Subject: James Rosado healing process
James Rosado is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Progress of Joseph Clyde
Dear Sir,
Joseph Clyde is doing pretty good at A Longmont Storm!
He has an ERA of 2.52, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
